title: Project Azorian, or: the CIA Steals A Submarine
itunes:title: Project Azorian, or: the CIA Steals A Submarine
description:
When the USSR lost a powerful submarine, the US scrambled to make the most of a grisly opportunity. In today's episode, the guys explore the strange series of events that led Uncle Sam to, in secret, heist a submarine -- prompting questions that remain unanswered in the modern day.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
